import pxToRem from'assets/theme-dark/functions/pxToRem';var white=colors.white;var size=typography.size,fontWeightBold=typography.fontWeightBold;var formControlLabel={styleOverrides:{root:{display:'block',minHeight:pxToRem(24),marginBottom:pxToRem(2)},label:{display:'inline-block',fontSize:size.sm,fontWeight:fontWeightBold,color:white.main,lineHeight:1,transform:"translateY(".concat(pxToRem(1),")"),marginLeft:pxToRem(4),'&.Mui-disabled':{color:white.main}}}};export default formControlLabel;
